args.justification: Assigning a coherent Class_Group to connect all classes related to chemicals and process units used in refinery operations.
Assigning the same Class_Group to group amine treating chemicals with other refinery-related chemicals and units.
Assigning the same Class_Group to connect sour water treatment processes with related refinery chemicals and units.
Assigning the same Class_Group to connect the vacuum distillation unit with other refinery process units and chemicals.

splits.name: Sour Water
splits.description: Water containing hydrogen sulfide and other sulfur compounds, often requiring treatment.

splits.name: Sour Water Stripper
splits.description: A process unit used to remove hydrogen sulfide and ammonia from sour water.

args.justification: The class 'Sour Water Treatment' is overloaded, containing both an environment (sour water) and a process unit (sour water stripper); splitting improves schema clarity.
Assigning the same Class_Group to the new 'Sour Water' class for schema consistency.
Assigning the same Class_Group to the new 'Sour Water Stripper' class for schema consistency.
